summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5840 for the improvement of 36th Avenue West, from West Bertona Street to Ruffner Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76999, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
